title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 325 - Medical And Surgical Care And Treatment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 325 - Medical And Surgical Care And Treatment

State Regulations

Subpart 325-1 - General (§ 325-1.1 to 325-1.26)

Subpart 325-2 - Recommending Of Authorized Physicians By Insurance Carriers And Employers; Procedure For Medical Inspectors And Consultants (§ 325-2.1 to 325-2.10)

Subpart 325-3 - Licensing And Operation Of Compensation Medical Bureaus (§ 325-3.1 to 325-3.10)

Subpart 325-4 - Authorization Of Hospitals And Health Maintenance Organizations (§ 325-4.1 to 325-4.6)

Subpart 325-5 - Computer match between health insurers and workers' compensation carriers (§ 325-5.1 to 325-5.11)

Subpart 325-6 - Reimbursement for workers' compensation claims paid by health insurers; arbitration of disputed requests for reimbursement (§ 325-6.1 to 325-6.19)

Subpart 325-7 - Diagnostic Testing Networks (§ 325-7.1 to 325-7.7)

Subpart 325-8 - Preferred Provider Organization Arrangements (§ 325-8.1 to 325-8.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 325

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13, 13-a, 13-b, 13-k, 13-l, 13-m, 13-n, 110-a[2][g], 117, 126, 137, 141, art. 10-A;Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58;Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
